Actually I didnt ignore them. RDahl said he fired on something else after I 
told him that hellpeon wasnt there. Unless he meant the somethign else being 
the Infecticon fighting presently(Rdahl can you clear that up for me?). And 
as for the 8 shots fired at the charachter, I havent posted yet so you cant 
even say I ignored them.  Besides only one was fired at the chrachter 
directly. The others were shot around him.

IC:
As the central shot approached the Infecticon, a thin barrier of chaochitan 
energy appeared and took the shot, and then immediately dissapeared 
afterward. The other seven shots all went past the Mysterious infecticon 
harmlessly. It then quickly opened fire on mutates torso and fired with each 
micro fusion blaster inside its chest twice, sending a total of twelve fusion 
blasts at mutate. As this happened the being flew backwards at an incredible 
speed and picked up Megatron, who was now in gun mode.

--part1_163.352828d.291573d2_boundary
